articles.author: Michael Peel, Harry Dempsey
articles.title: Ocean floor metals produce ‘dark oxygen’, research finds - Financial Times
articles.description: Discovery is expected to stoke debate about the effect of seabed mining
articles.content:
Ocean floor metals coveted by mining companies can electrically produce dark oxygen, according to new research that will stoke debate over the impact of seabed commercialisation.
